name: Terminator 2: Judgement Day
description:
Terminator 2: Judgement Day is an arcade game developed by LJN. It was originally released in 1991. Ocean Software published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Terminator 2: Judgement Day on PC.
Gale Anne Hurd, James Cameron and Mario Kassar produced the game. James Cameron directed the game. It was scored by Brad Fiedel.
